name: Vegetarian Borscht
author: Anonymous
summary: A rustic and hearty Eastern European classic originating from the Ukraine with beets, potatoes, and lentils. A wholesome soup for vegetarian diets and gentle on the budget, too. Serve with sour cream and fresh dill.
ingredients: 2 small beets, peeled and coarsely grated
2 tablespoons vegetable oil, or as needed
2 tablespoons sour cream, or more to taste
directions: Combine beets and vinegar in a small frying pan over low heat
Cook, while stirring, until soft, about 15 minutes
Heat oil in a large frying pan over low heat while beets are cooking
Add onion and stir for 2 minutes
Add carrots and cook, stirring occasionally, until soft, about 10 minutes
In the meantime, bring water to a simmer in a large saucepan
Add potatoes and cook for 10 minutes more
Stir in cooked beets and onion-carrot mixture
Add tomato paste and simmer until all vegetables are tender, about 10 minutes more
Serve with sour cream and dill
